decisions.title: Agent Knowledge Briefs
decisions.description: Create persistent agent briefs in /workspace/agents/ so sub-agents load context from files instead of re-explaining everything. Reduces context waste, improves delegation efficiency.

decisions.title: Dev Agent Created (Devin üõ†Ô∏è)
decisions.description: Add a Web Developer agent to own the MC codebase. Sam was writing code directly, violating the orchestrator role.

decisions.title: Weekly GSC Report Format
decisions.description: Use date ranges as column headers (e.g. '2/10-2/16'), current partial week + last full week + T-30 avg. Ben prefers concrete dates over ambiguous labels.

decisions.title: Delegation Audit Cron
decisions.description: Daily cron at 6 PM CAT to review Sam's delegation compliance. Need oversight to ensure Sam orchestrates rather than executes.

decisions.title: ISK Keyword Focus: During-Interview Only
decisions.description: Track 'during interview' keywords (ai interview assistant, helper, etc.) not prep keywords. ISK is a live interview tool, not a practice/prep tool.
